casebody.data:
99-0502 (La. 4/1/99)

Larry CLARK, et al. v. CITY OF SHREVEPORT, et al. No. 99-C-0502. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

*873IN RE: Clark, Larry; Myles, Gloria;— Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiora-ri and/or Review; Parish of Caddo 1st Judicial District Court Div. “G” Number 425,853; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, Number 31407-CA, 31649-CA

Denied.

MARCUS, J. not on panel. JOHNSON, J. would grant the writ.
